long_description: Whether you're biking around town or traveling out of the country, the knee-length Nau Motil Shorts will keep you comfortable with cotton/polyester fabric that resists moisture and dries fast. Blend of organic cotton and recycled polyester has a durable water repellent (DWR) coating that repels light rain showers and stains; DWR speeds drying time. 2 front hand pockets; 2 back drop-in pockets; rear zippered pocket; zippered thigh pocket; hidden cell phone pocket. The Nau Motil Shorts have a slim fit.
short_description: Whether you're biking around town or traveling out of the country, the knee-length Nau Motil Shorts will keep you comfortable with cotton/polyester fabric that resists moisture and dries fast.
